stimulusHtml: For a certain continuous function f, the right Riemann sum approximation of  ∫ 0 2 f ( x )   d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@433A@ with n subintervals of equal length is 2 ( n + 1 ) ( 3 n + 2 ) n 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@454E@ for all n. What is the value of ∫ 0 2 f ( x )   d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@433A@ ?
